title: Prefect for Generative AI Pipelines
description: Developing Generative AI products introduces challenges like indeterminism, data volume, and scalability. Teams must adapt, and selecting the right tools becomes essential, as we did with Prefect, a Pythonic workflow engine.

title: Practicing Typescript: Generalized Algebraic Data Types
description: How GADT and Pattern Matching look like in Typescript? Let's find out with an hands-on exercise

title: Software Development Companies in the AI Era
description: Unprecedented breakthroughs in LLMs are transforming software development. New techniques enable effective interactions with LLMs, but caution is advised to avoid unnecessary complexity.
